DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis to be tested is that the bioavailability of the new 30-mg vial is similar to that of the current approved 15 -mg vials. In addition, the SC injection using the new 30-mg vial is safe and well-tolerated.
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability and Relative Bioavailability of Pegvisomant in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy males or females between the ages of 21 and 55 years Positive urine drug screen Excessive use of alcohol or nicotinecontaining products Pregnant or nursing females
